item.title: Do they have permission?, 30th July
item.description:
Punching a hole through the hedge of Pittville School. I thought hedge works were embargoed until September to protect the wildlife in them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
